Description:
IN1 - You have failed to provide suitable and sufficient welfare facilities, as detailed in Schedule 2 of the Construction (Design and Management) Regulations 2015 (Minimum Welfare Facilities on Construction Sites), including a supply of hot and cold, or warm, running water in the immediate vicinity of a toilet.

IN2 - You have failed to ensure that the construction site is, so far as is reasonably practicable, kept in good order including clear walkways and safe access to the toilet facilities.

PN - You have failed to take suitable and sufficient measure to prevent as reasonably practicable, persons falling a distance liable to cause serious personal injury, in that there missing boards and incomplete edge protection on the scaffold.
